patterns: I'd like to order a pizza
Can I get a salad?
I want a burger
Please bring me some sushi
I'd like to order a large fries
Can you get me a sandwich?
I want to order a dessert
Please get me a drink
I'd like to have a smoothie
Can I order a side of wings?
I want a vegetarian pizza
Please bring me a Caesar salad
I'd like to order a steak
Can I have a bowl of ramen?
I want to order a fruit salad
Please get me a hot dog
I'd like to order a milkshake
Can I have a plate of nachos?
I want to order a seafood platter
Please get me a chocolate cake
responses: What would you like to order?
Please specify your order.
Could you tell me the details of your order?
What size would you like for your order?
Do you have any specific preferences for your order?

patterns: What’s the status of my order?
Can you tell me where my food is?
I want to track my delivery.
Where is my pizza?
Can you check the status of my order?
What time will my order arrive?
Is my order on the way?
Can you give me an update on my order?
I need to know the delivery status.
Where's my order?
How long until my food arrives?
Can you track my order for me?
What’s the ETA for my delivery?
Is my order still being prepared?
Can you tell me if my order has shipped?
I want to know if my food is ready.
responses: Please provide your order ID to track your order.
Tracking information is needed to assist you.
I can help you with that. Please share your order ID.
Let me check the status of your order. What is your order ID?
I need your order ID to provide the tracking details.

patterns: What do you have on the menu?
Show me your vegetarian options
List all desserts available.
What are your specials today?

What appetizers do you have?
Do you have gluten-free options?
What are the bestsellers?

What kind of salads do you offer?
Do you have any vegan dishes?
What are your side dishes?
Can you list the main courses?
What desserts do you recommend?
What drinks do you have available?
Can I see the kids' menu?
What are your breakfast options?
Do you have any seasonal items?
What is your most popular dish?
Can you tell me about your seafood options?

responses: Here is the menu: ...
We have a variety of options including...
Our specials today include...
You can find our vegetarian options here: ...
We offer a range of desserts, including...

patterns: I want to give feedback
How can I provide my feedback?
I have some comments about my order
Can I leave a review?
I want to share my experience
How do I submit feedback?
I have a suggestion for you
Can I report an issue?
I want to compliment the service
How can I express my dissatisfaction?
responses: We appreciate your feedback! Please share your comments.
Your feedback is important to us. What would you like to say?
Please let us know your thoughts.
We value your input. What feedback do you have?
Thank you for wanting to share your experience. Please go ahead.

patterns: Hi
Hello
Good morning
Good evening
Hey there
What's up?
How are you?
Greetings
Hi there!
Hello, how can I help you?
responses: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi there! What would you like to order?
Good to see you! How can I help you?
Hello! What can I do for you today?
Hi! Ready to place an order?

patterns: Goodbye
See you later
Thanks, I'm done
Bye
Take care
Have a nice day
I'm leaving now
See you next time
Thanks for your help
I appreciate it, goodbye
responses: Thank you for visiting! Have a great day!
Goodbye! We hope to see you again soon!
Take care! If you need anything else, just ask!
Thanks for chatting! Have a wonderful day!
See you later! Enjoy your meal!
